document_data.name: Haikur
document_data.Description: He clad himself in blue [[do-maru]] armor, with white-and-red [[kote]] and a [[kabuto]] helm. He had a long, black mustache.
document_data.Possessions: Haikur carried several weapons, including a [[katana]], a [[nunchaku]], and a [[daikyu]] for ranged combat.
document_data.History: Haikur was born in a small village in a hilly region of Kara-Tur. He grew up to hate the increasing presence of evil in his lands, becoming skilled in both martial arts and armored combat.
document_data.Activities: In addition to being an accomplished adventurer, Haikur was a renowned poet.
